title: LOOK AND LEASE TODAY!
posting_body: ['Contact info:', 'Idlewood Park Apartments| Parawest Management |', 'show contact info', 'LUXURY LIVING IN A GREAT LOCATION', '11675 W. Bellfort Ave.', 'Houston, TX 77099', '$1000/mo', 'KEY FEATURES', 'Sq Footage: 680 sqft.', 'Bedrooms: 1 Bed', 'Bathrooms: 1 Bath', 'Parking: 1 Off street', 'Lease Duration: 1 Year (See Details Below)', 'Deposit: Security Deposit Alternative', 'Pets Policy: Cats & Dogs OK (Pet restrictions apply)', 'Floor: 1st, 2nd 3rd', 'Property Type: Apartments', 'DESCRIPTION', 'Idlewood Park was created for those who know what they want out of life.', 'Our elegant homes of distinction provide carefree living with personalized service.', "You'll be surrounded by natural beauty and vitality.", 'With our central location, you are just minutes from fine dining, shopping, and recreation.', "With features such as a luxurious swimming pool and a heated outdoor spa area, you'll be living the good life at Idlewood Park.", 'RENTAL FEATURES', 'Living Room', 'Dining Room', 'Premium Carpet', 'Walk In Closets', 'Fully Equipped Kitchen', 'Dishwasher', 'Additional Storage', 'Washer and Dryer Connections', 'Patio/Balcony', 'SMART Home Features', 'COMMUNITY FEATURES', 'Online Rent Payments', 'On-Site Clothes Care Center', 'BBQ Pavilion', 'On-Site Clothes Care Center', 'Swimming Pool w/ Spa Tub', 'Business Center', 'Playground', 'Off-street parking & Carports', 'LEASE TERMS', 'Deposit depends on approval.', 'Criminal, credit and rental history check is required', 'CALL FOR ADDITIONAL INFO', 'Idlewood Park Apartments', '11675 W. Bellfort Ave.', 'Houston, TX 77099', 'show contact info', '<URL>']
